","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

ಡಾ. ನಾರ್ಮನ್ ಬೋರ್ಲಾಗ್

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:3011"},{"text":"

ವರ್ಗೀಸ್ ಕುರಿಯನ್
